image.Creator: Cassell, Charles E. (American architect, 1838-1916) architect
image.Title: University Chapel|University of Virginia Chapel|UVa Chapel
image.Current_Site: site: 145 McCormick Road, Charlottesville, Charlottesville, Virginia, United States
image.Description: Construction completed 1890. Windows designed by Tiffany & Co. and J. & R. Lamb and Sons; installed 1906. Window and door restoration conducted 1994-1995; windows restored by Beyer Studio, Philadelphia.
image.Image_View_Description: view of the bell tower and main entrance before window and door restoration, 1994-1995
image.Photography: Architect for Historic Buildings and Grounds, University of Virginia
image.Collection: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
